<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update portfolio plan configurations with kanban configuration</description>
        <name>Update Kanban config for PPConfigs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.info("app-alignment-workspace: Start to update portfolio plan configurations with kanban configuration");
        var portfolioPlanConfigList = [
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_planning_item', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_demand', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'category,strategic_program,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'category,strategic_program,primary_goal'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_project', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_program', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,initiative,percent_complete'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,initiative,percent_complete'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_initiative', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,percent_complete,strategic_priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,percent_complete,strategic_priority'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_scrum_epic', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,methodology,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,methodology,primary_goal'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_custom_planning_item_1', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_custom_planning_item_2', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_custom_planning_item_3', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_custom_planning_item_4', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}
                ]
            },
            {
                'source_table': 'sn_align_core_custom_planning_item_5', 
                'fields': [
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'planning_state'}, 
                    {'name': 'prioritization_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_swim_lane_field', 'value': 'priority'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_default_vertical_lane_field', 'value': 'owner'}, 
                    {'name': 'roadmap_kanban_card_fields', 'value': 'status,strategic_program,primary_goal'}
                ]
            }
        ];
        portfolioPlanConfigList.forEach(function(config) {
            var configGr = new GlideRecord('sn_align_ws_roadmap_configuration');
            configGr.addQuery('source_table', config['source_table']);
            configGr.query();
            if(configGr.next()) {
                config['fields'].forEach(function(field) {
                    configGr.setValue(field['name'], field['value']);
                });
                if(configGr.update()) {
                    gs.info('app-alignment-workspace: Updated Kanban configuration succeed for portfolio plan configuration: ' + config['source_table']);
                } else {
                    gs.error('app-alignment-workspace: Fail to update Kanban configuration for portfolio plan configuration: ' + config['source_table']);
                }
            }
        });
        gs.info("app-alignment-workspace: End of update portfolio plan configurations with kanban configuration");]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-21 21:38:43</sys_created_on>

        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
